spiritsExplanation:
The workout is characterized by "3' intervals at low rhythms," indicating a focus on steady, continuous movement, aligning well with the "Flow & Rhythm" spirit. The choice of music from diverse energetic genres like "Dance mid, Global Hits" supports the rhythmic aspect, earning a strong score of 0.8.

The description mentions "Build your aerobic base" and "Workout intensity level: 1 out of 3," suggesting a gentle, restorative approach. This aligns with "Soothing & Restorative," though less prominently, warranting a score of 0.6.

Lastly, the structured intervals suggest an element of "Structured & Disciplined" training, though the low intensity and focus on breathing make it a less fitting spirit, resulting in a moderate score of 0.4. The "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit is excluded as there is no explicit mention of outdoor elements, despite the rowing image which might suggest an outdoor setting.
